bibl.title: P.Petrie III 104-106 e l'introduzione della figura del toparches nell'Arsinoites.
bibl.note: Reconsiders jointly P. Petrie III, 104, 105 and 106 and various other fragments, which originally constituted a single document. Restores some lines of P. Petrie III, 106 R fr. 2 and dates the text to the third year of Euergetes (245/244). Backdates of about ten year the introduction of the toparches in the Arsinoites. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Lorenzo Fati, P.Petrie III 104-106 e l'introduzione della figura del toparches nell'Arsinoites.

Reconsiders jointly P. Petrie III, 104, 105 and 106 and various other fragments, which originally constituted a single document. Restores some lines of P. Petrie III, 106 R fr. 2 and dates the text to the third year of Euergetes (245/244). Backdates of about ten year the introduction of the toparches in the Arsinoites. - Avec résumé en anglais.
